overview: Sid and Bernie keep having their amorous intentions snubbed by their girlfriends Joan and Anthea, so when they decide to take them on a holiday to Paradise Camp, they think they're off to a nudist colonyâ€”but they couldn't be more wrong, and meet up with the weirdest bunch of campers you can imagine.
tagline: Fun and games in the great outdoors!
title: Carry On Camping
